    • TradingManager

      public TradingManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with getting database

  • Method Details

    • requestTrade

      public Trade requestTrade​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String userId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thisUserOfferId, java.lang.String secondUserOfferId, int allowedEdits) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      Creates a new temporary trade
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      userId - the id of the user being traded with
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place (make this time to be the same or earlier than the first meeting time for a permanent trade)
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      thisUserOfferId - the item id of that this current user is willing to offer
      secondUserOfferId - the item id that the user who got sent the trade is willing to offer
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
      Returns:
      the trade object
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - the user that wants to be traded with doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - the item for trading cannot be traded
      CannotTradeException - cannot request a trade

    • requestLend

      public Trade requestLend​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String userId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thisUserOfferId, int allowedEdits) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      Requests to lend an item to someone
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      userId - the id of the user to lend to
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place (make this time to be the same or earlier than the first meeting time for a permanent trade)
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      thisUserOfferId - the item id of that this current user is willing to offer
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
      Returns:
      the trade object
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - the user that wants to be traded with doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - the item for trading cannot be traded
      CannotTradeException - cannot request a trade

    • requestBorrow

      public Trade requestBorrow​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String userId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thatUserOfferId, int allowedEdits) throws TradableItemNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      Requests to borrow an item from someone
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      userId - the id of the user to borrow from
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place (make this time to be the same or earlier than the first meeting time for a permanent trade)
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      thatUserOfferId - the item id to borrow
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
      Returns:
      the trade object
      Throws:
      TradableItemNotFoundException - the items passed in for trading doesn't exist
      UserNotFoundException - the user that wants to be traded with doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - the item for trading cannot be traded
      CannotTradeException - cannot request a trade

    • denyTrade

      public void denyTrade​(java.lang.String tradeId) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException
      For denying a requested trade
      Parameters:
      tradeId - trade id
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade id wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - if the traders in the trade weren't found

    • confirmFirstMeeting

      public void confirmFirstMeeting​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeId, boolean status) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException
      Confirms the first meeting
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      tradeId - id of the trade
      status - if the meeting is confirmed and the trade happened
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - if the user doesn't exist

    • confirmRequest

      public boolean confirmRequest​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeId) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, CannotTradeException
      For confirming a trade request
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      tradeId - the trade id
      Returns:
      if the request was confirmed
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user is not a trader
      UserNotFoundException - if the user doesn't exist
      CannotTradeException - if trading limitations prevent the trade from happening

    • confirmSecondMeeting

      public void confirmSecondMeeting​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeId, boolean status) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException
      Confirms the second meeting
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      tradeId - id of the trade
      status - if the meeting is confirmed and the trade happened
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - if the other user of the trade is not found

    • counterTradeOffer

      public Trade counterTradeOffer​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thisTraderOffer, java.lang.String thatTraderOffer) throws CannotTradeException, TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException
      Sending a counter offer
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader id
      tradeId - the trade id
      meetingTime - the new time of the trade
      secondMeetingTime - the second meeting time of the trade
      meetingLocation - the meeting location of the trade
      thisTraderOffer - the tradable item id that the current trader is offering
      thatTraderOffer - the tradable item id that the current trader wants from the other trader
      Returns:
      the id of the trade
      Throws:
      CannotTradeException - too many edits
      TradeNotFoundException - this trade doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - user wasn't found
